thread.title: Spokesman Shares First Photo of George H.W. Bush, Barbara Bush Since Hospitalization
thread.title_full: Spokesman Shares First Photo of George H.W. Bush, Barbara Bush Since Hospitalization

author: Josh Feldman
title: Spokesman Shares First Photo of George H.W. Bush, Barbara Bush Since Hospitalization
text:
Spokesman Shares First Photo of George H.W. Bush, Barbara Bush Since Hospitalization by Josh Feldman | 6:56   
A spokesman for George H.W. Bush and Barbara Bush posted the first photo of the former president and first lady since their recent hospitalization. 
The 41st president was hospitalized over a week ago for shortness of breath, while Mrs. Bush was hospitalized on the same day for bronchitis. 
As of today, she has been discharged from the hospital and her husband is now out of the ICU. Initially Barbara Bush was told she could be discharged yesterday, but she decided to stay and be with her husband. 
Spokesman Jim McGrath posted this photo today of the couple together, thanking everyone for their prayers and expressions of love: President and Mrs @GeorgeHWBush thank their fellow Americans and friends from around the world for their prayers and good wishes. pic.twitter.com/PhpXXGKl6p 
— Jim McGrath (@jgm41) January 23, 2017 
[ featured image via Jim McGrath ] 
——
